successes.title: Melon: A Headband and Mobile App to Measure Your Focus
successes.description: Gain insight into how your mind works by tracking your focus during any activity you choose. Understand yourself. Learn differently.

Pledges.description: Thank you for supporting Melon! Your donation is much appreciated. In return for your kindness, we will love you eternally!
You will receive awesome Melon scratch-n-sniff stickers! And, of course, our love and gratitude. Thanks for supporting Melon!
You will receive a limited edition, Kickstarter-only Melon screen print poster designed by Nicholas Dupey.
EARLY BIRDS You will receive a Melon headband in your choice of black or white, plus the app, at a Kickstarter-only price of $79! Thank you for your early support!
SDK and Hardware Hacking Documentation available.
HEADBAND One Melon headband in your choice of black or white, plus the app! Thank you for your support!
SDK and Hardware Hacking Documentation available.

CUSTOM BADGE You will receive a Melon headband in either black or white, plus the app. You will also get to pick the color of the badge from one of five Kickstarter-only badge colors! Badge colors are yellow (pictured), gray (pictured), lavender, orange, and blue
SDK and Hardware Hacking Documentation available.
